article_title: Vicky Hartzler will have a Democratic opponent in 2016
article_text: The facts, faces and hum of local politics with Steve Kraske and Dave Helling

article_metadata.description: A former chief of staff at the University of Missouri Hospital has announced that he’ll run for Missouri’s 4th Congressional District.
article_metadata.title: Vicky Hartzler will have a Democratic opponent in 2016 | The Kansas City Star
